alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Tift; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:42AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Irwin, northeastern Dougherty, Turner, south central Lee, Tift, Ben Hill and Worth Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 941 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Abbeville to near Turner City. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Ashburn, Ocilla, Fitzgerald, Sylvester, Albany, Poulan, Ty Ty, Phillipsburg, Mystic, Unionville, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Sumner, Rebecca, Stocks, Scooterville and Osierfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
